title: Details for {{name}}

questions.uber: Does {{name}} need a free Uber ride to/from the event?
questions.laptop: Is {{name}} requesting a free laptop for the event?
questions.dietary: Does {{name}} have any dietary restrictions or food allergies?
questions.interests: Which of these is {{name}} interested in?
questions.experience: How much experience does {{name}} have coding? (It's ok if the answer is none!)
questions.ethnicity: What does {{name}} consider themself? (This is just for statistics.)
questions.workshops: Which of these workshops would {{name}} want to attend?

experience.intro: I've taken an intro coding class (or AP CS Principals).
experience.advanced: I've taken a more advanced coding class (AP CS A, college classes, etc).
experience.projects: I've coded my own projects for fun.

likert: Do you agree with the following statement?
last: This is the last page. Your responses are automatically saved.
study: This optional question is part of a research study.
